parameters.name: EffectiveTime
parameters.description:
The time when you want to upgrade the major version. Valid values:

*   **Immediately** (default): immediately upgrades the major version.
*   **MaintainTime**: upgrades the major version within the maintenance window.

>  You can call the [ModifyInstanceMaintainTime](~~473775~~) operation to modify the maintenance window of an instance.

parameters.name: MajorVersion
parameters.description: The major version to which you want to upgrade the instance. Valid values: **4.0** and **5.0**.
